sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Reclass Widgets">79ecccec2f902510b77fd5ccf699b6c8</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {

	var source_table = 'x_803922_demo_cmdb_widget';
	
	var gr = new GlideRecord( source_table );
	gr.addEncodedQuery( 'name=' + source.u_name + '^operational_status=' + source.u_operational_status );
	gr.query();
	while( gr.next() ){
		gs.info( 'JD: Reclassing ' + gr.name );
	}
	
	ignore = true;

})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>john.dahl</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-01-06 12:43:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>9a2dc0202fd02510b77fd5ccf699b6cf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onBefore</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Demo cmdb" source="x_803922_demo_cmdb">cfb6f43f973595106b6050081153afcb</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Demo cmdb">cfb6f43f973595106b6050081153afcb</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_9a2dc0202fd02510b77fd5ccf699b6cf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>john.dahl</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-01-06 12:43:56</sys_updated_on><when>onBefore</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
